name: image_type_to_mime_type
purpose:
Get Mime-Type for image-type returned by getimagesize,
   exif_read_data, exif_thumbnail, exif_imagetype

return.description:
The returned values are as follows
   
   Returned values Constants
    
     
      
       imagetype
       Returned value
      
     
     
      
       IMAGETYPE_GIF
       image/gif
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_JPEG
       image/jpeg
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_PNG
       image/png
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_SWF
       application/x-shockwave-flash
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_PSD
       image/psd
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_BMP
       image/bmp
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_TIFF_II (intel byte order)
       image/tiff
      
      
       
        IMAGETYPE_TIFF_MM (motorola byte order)
       
       image/tiff
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_JPC
       application/octet-stream
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_JP2
       image/jp2
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_JPX
       application/octet-stream
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_JB2
       application/octet-stream
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_SWC
       application/x-shockwave-flash
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_IFF
       image/iff
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_WBMP
       image/vnd.wap.wbmp
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_XBM
       image/xbm
      
      
       IMAGETYPE_ICO
       image/vnd.microsoft.icon

notes.description: This function does not require the GD image library.
